headline: Is Amphenol’s 104% Rally Justified After Surge in Connector Demand?
summary: Wondering if Amphenol’s shares still offer real value after so much excitement? Let’s take a quick, honest look at where the stock stands today. Amphenol has just posted an impressive 7.1% gain in the last week and is up a stunning 104.2% year-to-date, with a 95.5% return over the past 12 months. Much of this recent surge has been driven by positive industry sentiment and renewed interest in tech hardware, following news about increased demand for Amphenol’s connectors in new industrial and...
